name: Curve ankrETH Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and ankrETH, a token that represents staked ether in Ankr Staking, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and ankrETH, a token that represents staked ether in Ankr Staking, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, bir ETH 2.0 staking platformu olan Ankr Staking'de stake edilen etheri temsil eden bir token olan ETH ve ankrETH'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ETH and ankrETH, a token that represents staked ether in Ankr Staking, an ETH 2.0 staking platform.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 ETH 和 ankrETH。ankrETH 是由以太 2.0 质押平台 Ankr Staking 发行的质押以太币。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस पूल में ETH और ankrETH शामिल हैं, एक टोकन जो ETH 2.0 स्टेकिंग प्लेटफॉर्म Ankr Staking में स्टेक्ड ईथर का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।
